import React from 'react'; import {addCart} from '../../redux/index'; import {removeCart} from '../../redux/index'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { uuid } from 'uuidv4'; import "./sticks.css" const SticksContainer = (props) => { return (
Sticks
Bauer Stick
$299.99
Warrior Stick
$289.99
CCM Stick
$319.99
True Stick
$249.99
SHERWOOD Stick
$99.99
Graph Stick
$199.99
); } const mapStateToProps=state=>{ return { numItems: state.cart } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch =>{ return{ addCart: itemObj=>dispatch(addCart(itemObj)), removeCart: itemId=>dispatch(removeCart(itemId)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(SticksContainer)
